container-v1alpha1-ContainerStatus.description: ContainerStatus describes the status of a pod with its init, wait and main container.

image.description: The image the container is running. More info: https://kubernetes.io/docs/concepts/containers/images

message.description: A human readable message indicating details about why the pod is in this condition.

reason.description: A brief CamelCase message indicating details about why the pod is in this state. e.g. 'Evicted'

state.description: Details about the container's current condition.

container-v1alpha1-PodStatus.description: PodStatus describes the status of a pod with its init, wait and main container

containerStatus.description: ContainerStatus contains the status of the pod that executes the configured container.

initContainerStatus.description: InitContainerStatus contains the status of the init container.

lastRun.description: LastRun is the time when the pod was executed the last time.

podName.description: PodName is the name of the created pod.

waitContainerStatus.description: WaitContainerStatus contains the status of the wait container.

core-v1-ContainerState.description: ContainerState holds a possible state of container. Only one of its members may be specified. If none of them is specified, the default one is ContainerStateWaiting.

core-v1-ContainerStateRunning.description: ContainerStateRunning is a running state of a container.

startedAt.description: Time at which the container was last (re-)started

core-v1-ContainerStateTerminated.description: ContainerStateTerminated is a terminated state of a container.

exitCode.description: Exit status from the last termination of the container

finishedAt.description: Time at which the container last terminated

message.description: Message regarding the last termination of the container

reason.description: (brief) reason from the last termination of the container

signal.description: Signal from the last termination of the container

startedAt.description: Time at which previous execution of the container started

core-v1-ContainerStateWaiting.description: ContainerStateWaiting is a waiting state of a container.

message.description: Message regarding why the container is not yet running.

reason.description: (brief) reason the container is not yet running.

meta-v1-Time.description: Time is a wrapper around time.Time which supports correct marshaling to YAML and JSON.  Wrappers are provided for many of the factory methods that the time package offers.

description: ProviderStatus is the container provider specific status

apiVersion.description: APIVersion defines the versioned schema of this representation of an object. Servers should convert recognized schemas to the latest internal value, and may reject unrecognized values. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#resources

kind.description: Kind is a string value representing the REST resource this object represents. Servers may infer this from the endpoint the client submits requests to. Cannot be updated. In CamelCase. More info: https://git.k8s.io/community/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#types-kinds

lastOperation.description: LastOperation defines the last run operation of the pod. The operation can be either reconcile or deletion.

podStatus.description: PodStatus indicated the status of the executed pod.

title: container-v1alpha1-ProviderStatus
